data.description: An interface to the C binding of DRMAA spec
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows access to DRMAA. DRMAA allows for job, control
    and submission via a DRM such as SGE and CONDOR. Schedule was
    suggested as top level namespace, via the Perl Module Authors
    mailing list. The 'c' in DRMAA c reflects that this module is a
    one-to-one mapping to the C binding for the DRMAA spec, generated
    via a SWIG interface.
